00033 
00034 #include "trial.h"
00035 
00036 #include <algorithm>
00037 using namespace std;
00038 
00039 namespace cluster {
00040 
00041   size_t trial_generator::get_sample_size(size_t k) {
00042     return min(init_size + 2 * k, num_objects);
00043   }
00044 
00045   static size_t count_all(const trial_generator& tg) {
00046     trial_generator dummy = tg;
00047     while (dummy.has_next()) dummy.next();
00048     return dummy.count();
00049   }
00050 
00051     
00052   trial_generator::trial_generator(size_t _max_k, size_t _max_reps, size_t _init_size, size_t _num_objects)
00053     : max_k(_max_k), 
00054       max_reps(_max_reps), 
00055       init_size(_init_size), 
00056       num_objects(_num_objects),
00057       cur_trial(1, 0, get_sample_size(1)),
00058       iterations(0)
00059   { 
00060     number_of_trials = count_all(*this);
00061   }
00062     
00063     
00064   trial_generator::trial_generator(size_t _min_k, size_t _max_k, size_t _max_reps, size_t _init_size, 
00065                                  size_t _num_objects)
00066     : max_k(_max_k), 
00067       max_reps(_max_reps), 
00068       init_size(_init_size), 
00069       num_objects(_num_objects),
00070       cur_trial(_min_k, 0, get_sample_size(_min_k)),
00071       iterations(0)
00072   { 
00073     number_of_trials = count_all(*this);
00074   }
00075     
00076 
00077   bool trial_generator::has_next() const {
00078     return cur_trial.k <= max_k;
00079   }
00080 
00081 
00082   trial trial_generator::next() {
00083     trial result = cur_trial;
00084 
00085     // iterate first through trials, then through k's, and only do one trial if the sample size is
00086     // equal to the maximum sample size.
00087     cur_trial.rep++;
00088     if (cur_trial.rep >= max_reps || cur_trial.sample_size == num_objects) {
00089       cur_trial.rep = 0;
00090       cur_trial.k++;
00091       cur_trial.sample_size = get_sample_size(cur_trial.k);
00092     }
00093 
00094     iterations++;
00095     return result;
00096   }
00097 
00098 
00099   size_t trial_generator::num_trials() {
00100     return number_of_trials;    
00101   }
00102 
00103   size_t trial_generator::count() const {
00104     return iterations;
00105   }
